messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Ernest Blaber is fed up with being told what to do by remote bureaucrats.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop health tourism. Ensure it is a service for our people's benefit. Cut managers by half.
Out with council tax, business rates & stamp duty. In with 2.5% local sales tax. No VAT on domestic fuel.

mentions.candidate: Ernest Blaber supports our policies and is prepared to fight our corner in North East Somerset.

issues.brexitEurope: Remote bureaucrats of the EU are a constraint on the UK. UKIP played a pivotal role in helping Britain leave the EU.
issues.health: Invest in the NHS, stop health tourism, and ensure it serves the people's benefit.
issues.immigration: Control our borders with a points-based Australian-style system.

leaflet.personalStatement: Ernest Blaber says: 'People are fed up with being told what to do by remote bureaucrats who see the UK as a cash cow.'

contactInformation.address: Mill House, Mill House Lane, Tadwick, Bath BA1 9AG

quotes.text: Ernest Blaber supports our policies and UKIP played a pivotal role in helping Britain leave the EU.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Ernest Blaber mentions that UKIP was instrumental in the Brexit process.
